column3: Latest;Kompong Thom: A man accused of ------stabbing a security guard------ (and father of 6) to death in  Phnom Penh’s Boeung Keng Kang district on March 19
column5: was arrested in Kampong Thom province this evening.------Lieutenant General Ngeng Chou confirmed that the attacker
column11: and then fled.------The perpetrator was arrested around 5 pm in Prey Ponleak Village
column14: Kampong Thom province.------After questioning the suspect
column15: the suspect admitted that he had stabbed the victim because of the victim’s ‘blasphemy’ (*disrespectful words?). ------He is being transferred from Kompong Thom to the Phnom Penh Municipal Police for further action.------WARNING (graphic video in link) ------FAST NEWS
